guides.name: Thomas Daw
guides.motto: CIT230 shouldn't be a required class for CIT majors.
guides.about: Thomas loves being in the water and swiming is one of his favorite things.

guides.name: Abby Smith
guides.motto: Hike the Rivers in your Life.
guides.about: Abby is a talented river trail hiker. Abby loves to help familes and people have fun on the trails.

guides.name: Dave Newton
guides.motto: Give a man a fish and feed him for a day, teach a man to catch a fish and take away all of his other hobbies
guides.about: Dave loves fishing and is living his dream teaching people how to fish.
